q: former business partners, Simon Fuller and Simon Fuller Jones, met with an unnamed network years ago. "It was so bad that a minute into the pitch the guy said, "No..." he recalled. He said you can leave now, and I said,` So it sounds to me that you don't like the show?' And he said,` Get out.' And I said,` So should we come back next week?' And he said,` Get out." "We were basically thrown out of the network, Simon Cowell said. "The good news is, it would never get worse than this." Fox went on to premiere Idol in 2002. Simon Cowell stepped down from the show last year to focus on a U.S.
